characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings , Words of Radiance

characterDescription: Tozbek is Captain of the Wind's Pleasure. He is Thaylen. His wife is Ashlv. He has very good business connections with House Davar in Vedenar. Shallan suspects that he might be able to read, which is unseemly for a man.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is a short man. He has long white Thaylen eyebrows that curve up in a curiously stiff, spiked pattern, yet he is bald. He wears a simple knit cap and a silver-buttoned black coat. He has a scar on his jaw caused by loose tackle during rough weather.
